hero.title: Where Every Property Tells a Story
hero.descr: Welcome to Vome - your partner for real estate photography and videography services in Poland. We specialize in creating high-quality and captivating visuals that will help you sell or rent properties quickly and effectively.

offers.title: We offer a full range of real estate photography and videography services.

quality.title: Professional Quality
quality.descr: We strive for excellence and deliver high-quality photos and videos that capture the ambiance and attractiveness of each property.

creativity.title: Creativity
creativity.descr: We have an eye for the uniqueness of every home and find creative ways to accentuate its advantages.

efficiency.title: Efficiency
efficiency.descr: Our team works quickly and professionally to ensure your properties are ready for showcasing in the shortest possible time.

personalization.title: Personalization
personalization.descr: We take into account your individual needs and aim to provide you with a solution that reflects the uniqueness of each property.

contacts.title: Contacts
contacts.descr: Contact us in any way that works for you

video.title: Welcome to our Portfolio
video.descr: Thank you for visiting our portfolio page at Vome. While we continue to build our collection of real estate photography and videography projects, we are excited to share with you the work we have accomplished so far. Each project we undertake is approached with exceptional results.

photos.title: Photos
photos.descr: Browse our captivating portfolio of real estate photography. From aerial views to interior shots, our images capture the essence of properties. Let our photos speak for themselves.

prices.title: See the price
prices.descr: Discover the value we offer for our services. At Vome, we are passionate about capturing real estate photography and videography projects that exceed expectations. Take a look at our competitive pricing options below:

videos.title: Real Estate Videography
videos.content: 1-2 minute video tour of the property

full.title: The Full Package
full.video: 1-2 minute video tour of the property

aero.title: Aerial Photography and Videography (Coming Soon)
aero.descr: Aerial photos and videos of the property. +400 PLN to any package

offers.title: Special Offers for Agencies
offers.descr: Contact us to discuss special pricing and customized packages designed specifically for your agency's requirements. Fill out the contact form below, and our team will get back to you promptly to provide further assistance.
offers.name: Your Name

about.title: About Vome
about.mikita: I'm Mikita Klimuk, a professional videographer with over 5 years of experience in the field. Throughout my career, I have worked on numerous diverse and challenging projects, honing my skills and pushing the boundaries of visual storytelling. With a passion for capturing captivating moments, I have dedicated myself to delivering high-quality video content.
about.experience: For more than 4 years, I have been creating content for YouTube, building a strong online presence and cultivating a deep understanding of the digital landscape. This experience has allowed me to refine my craft, adapt to emerging trends, and develop a keen eye for engaging visual narratives.
about.editing: Over the years, I have had the privilege of working on projects in multiple countries and collaborating with renowned brands. This exposure to different cultures and industries has expanded my perspective and enhanced my ability to bring unique stories to life through my lens.

offers.title: At Vome, we pride ourselves on offering exceptional services that set us apart. When you choose us, you can expect:
offers.pricing: Competitive Pricing: We believe that high-quality videography should be accessible to everyone. Our pricing is designed to offer excellent value without compromising on the quality of our work.
offers.prof: Professionalism and Reliability: We understand the importance of delivering on our promises. We take pride in our professionalism, meeting deadlines, and ensuring a smooth and seamless experience for our clients.
offers.time: Swift Turnaround: We value your time and strive to provide timely deliverables. Our efficient workflow allows us to maintain a quick turnaround time without compromising on quality.
offers.equipment: State-of-the-Art Equipment: We stay up-to-date with the latest videography equipment and technology to ensure that we can capture every detail with precision and clarity.
offers.reletionship: Personalized Approach: We believe in building strong relationships with our clients. We take the time to understand your unique vision and requirements, tailoring our services to meet your specific needs.
offers.creative: Creative Expertise: Our years of experience and diverse portfolio have equipped us with a wide range of creative techniques and storytelling approaches. We bring innovation and a fresh perspective to every project we undertake.
offers.thanks: Thank you for considering Vome. We are excited to collaborate with you and create stunning visual content that will exceed your expectations.

footer.title: Where Every Property Tells a Story
footer.descr: Welcome to Vome - your partner for real estate photography and videography services in Poland
